summary: This i one of the most epic weapons ever made on nexus, you better check it out...
descriptionHtml:
This mod does simply enough add some sounds to the Headsman\'s Axe. The axe will have much longer hit range and make som animal noises when attackin and sheating. This is not a \"serious\" mod, its just a fun mod. The axe have mostly been used to rescue you own hide when low on health cause the high damage this weapon have.

ID of the Axe: 000BE25E

FAQ

Q. Is this a troll mod?
A. No, its just a mod for peoples that are kinda bore and wants some funny action in the game...

Q. What animal sounds are there?
A. Goat, Cow, Dog, Fox

Q. The axe dissapers when changing weapns, what should i do?
A. If you download the latest version you just spawn 10000000, because they will weight 0.

Hope you liked the mod, please comment of what you think of the mod :)

BTW FIRST MOD!!!
author: SIMEON EKSE
